p: An MCQ will test the participants’ knowledge before and after the CBL (see an example of MCQ item in Table 5). It will consist of one best answer format with three options will be developed for this trial based on guidelines for designing and developing questionnaires [ 17, 18]. The items in the multiple-choice quiz will be based on content in national guidelines. The national guidelines will be distributed to the participants before the CBL session by email as course material and will be available online [ 19].
